ai-mil6.2.6:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, what is the cause of your deeds to be born? What is the reason why no birth?”
ai-mil6.2.6:1.2_0: “Great king, all sentient beings who are born in their deeds,
ai-mil6.2.6:1.3_0: all the seeds that have been born,
ai-mil6.2.6:1.4_0: The earth and water are all on the earth, and all those born in you.
ai-mil6.2.6:1.5_0: These two, namely, are the same for the sake of (wholesome) deeds,
ai-mil6.2.6:1.6_0: But would not be able to say that extinguishment by circumstances you to do so, whether a noble disciple gives rise to ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind have arisen in the past?”
ai-mil6.2.6:1.7_0: “Sir, Nāgadatta, when he’s delivered, his question was resplendently exclusively delivered, grabbed to him with decrease and charming gold.”
ai-mil6.2.6:2.1_0: The sixth enquiry is the sixth thing.
